full_summary:
**Ground-Based Air Defence Qualified Bidders List**

**Reference Information**

* **Reference Number**: PW-__BM-036-29334
* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-185732/F
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-04
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-08-30T14:00:00

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Govt. of Canada - Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering
* **Procurement Deadline**: August 30, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)

**Contracting Entity**

* **Entity Name**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Entity Contact**: Darren Langdon, (819) 639-3772 (darren.langdon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Description**

The Government of Canada is seeking qualified bidders for the Ground-Based Air Defence system. The tender is open to all interested suppliers who can provide the required goods and services. Suppliers must be qualified in accordance with the requirements outlined in the attached tender documents.

**Notice documents**

The notice documents can be found at the following locations:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/04/03/390d2431a118297da546ca8923d1457d/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B036.E29334.EBSU000.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/04/03/390d2431a118297da546ca8923d1457d/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B036.E29334.EBSU000.PDF)
* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/04/03/ad6a6bd37edc4f527a3c075b02fcf33c/ABES.PROD.PW__BM.B036.F29334.EBSU000.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2024/04/03/ad6a6bd37edc4f527a3c075b02fcf33c/ABES
